name: momentous-darter
description: A personal RSS reader built with Remix, TypeScript, and CockroachDB. This file defines project metadata, scripts, and dependencies.

scripts.build:comment: Compiles the application for production. Remix is a full-stack web framework, so this command builds both the frontend (React components) and the backend (server-side logic) into a production-ready output in the 'build/' directory.
scripts.dev:comment: Starts the development server. The '--manual' flag means you need to manually restart the server when you make changes to server-side code. The frontend will still hot-reload.
scripts.start:comment: Runs the production server using the output from the 'build' script. This is how you would run the application in a production environment.
scripts.lint:comment: Runs ESLint to statically analyze the code for potential errors and style issues. It checks all TypeScript (.ts) and TypeScript with JSX (.tsx) files.
scripts.format:comment: Formats the code using Prettier, an opinionated code formatter. The '--write' flag modifies files in place.
scripts.format:check:comment: Checks if the code is formatted correctly without modifying any files. This is useful for CI/CD pipelines.
scripts.test:comment: Runs the test suite using Vitest, a fast test runner for Vite-based projects. Remix uses Vite under the hood.
scripts.check: pnpm lint && pnpm format:check && pnpm test
scripts.check:comment: A convenience script that runs the linter, format checker, and tests in sequence. This is often used as a pre-commit hook or in CI/CD.

devDependencies.__comment__: Dependencies used only for development, like linters, test runners, and build tools. They are not included in the production build.

dependencies.__comment__: Dependencies that are required for the application to run in production.
